description: Research specialist conducting in-depth analysis, information gathering, and synthesis using AI tools to accelerate research processes and extract insights from large volumes of content

SKL-062.skill_phrase: engineered prompts for AI content generation via Google AI Studio

SKL-063.skill_phrase: synthesized information from AI-generated content via Google AI Studio

tool_details.TOOL-AI-222: Google AI Studio - PRIMARY tool (daily use) - Research acceleration and information extraction

workflow_details.WRF-022: Summarize YouTube Video - Extract research insights from educational videos

object_details.OBJ-SMM-016: Video Summary - Structured analysis of research content

typical_tasks: Extract key findings from research videos and lectures
Synthesize information from multiple academic sources
Analyze industry trends from video content
Validate research hypotheses using AI-extracted data
Document research findings with AI-generated summaries
Conduct competitive analysis from video demonstrations
